name: Pattern studies - Typographic patterns #1
description:
This work is part of study on generative, interactive and animated patterns which explores the relation between simplicity and complexity.
This is a simple grid of caps "Y" drawn with the 'Monoton' font. To explore you can move the mouse to scale and rotate the letter, click to re-scale the grid. Press any key to change the character used.
The font used is 'Monoton' by Vernon Adams available under the Open Font License at https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Monoton#standard-styles
